DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether AN2690 topical solution safe effective treatment onychomycosis toenail .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety AN2690 Topical Solution Treat Onychomycosis Toenail
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis distal subungual onychomycosis affect least one great toenail KOH positive screening Willingness use product include nail polish apply toenail study Women childbearing potential currently sexually active must agree use contraception entire study period Concurrent recent use certain topical systemic medication without sufficient washout period History significant chronic fungal disease onychomycosis Significant confounding condition assess study doctor Participated trial investigational drug device within 30 day participation research study concurrent study Pregnancy lactation
